alert.note: Alert for Allen (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 03 at 9:28PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Kinder Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River near White Oak Park ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Oakdale Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Oberlin. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Moderate flooding will occur with several access roads to the river flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM CST Friday was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 13.5 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Calcasieu River Oberlin 13.0 14.9 Fri 9 pm CST 14.8 14.5 14.2 &&
